ygData.subject: Re: XP Penalty
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh forget to mention erudite - an advanced human race, do they suffer from xp panalty? ... it was missed, anyway... ... human wiz and a elf wiz both start a
ygData.messageBody:
Oh forget to mention erudite - an advanced human race, do they suffer from
xp panalty?

> No one answer my question regarding the above in my previous msg, guessed
it was missed, anyway...
>
> I read that human char has advantage in rising lvl, does that mean if a
human wiz and a elf wiz both start a new char and team up to fight, human
wiz will gain xp and rise lvl faster the the elf wiz?
>
> If this is true, what is the penalty like? Any percentage? How abt amg
all non-human races - eg compare troll vs half-elf or dward vs ogre?
>
> Thx.
>
> Mondain
